articles.title: HGTV Cancels 'Rehab Addict' After Star Nicole Curtis Used Racial Slur While Filming Series; Removes Show From HBO Max & Discovery+ - Deadline
articles.description: HGTV has canceled Rehab Addict after its star, Nicole Curtis, used a racial slur that was caught on camera while she filmed the series.

articles.title: Ben Stiller Shuts Down Congressman for Demanding FCC Investigation into Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl Halftime Show: ‘Bunny’s Got Huge Talent and Even Bigger Heart’ - Variety
articles.description: Ben Stiller is mocking congressman Randy Fine for demanding the FCC investigate Bad Bunny's Super Bowl Halftime Show.

articles.title: Bijou Phillips Is Urgently Seeking Kidney Donor While Hospitalized: ‘Time Is of the Essence’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Bijou Phillips has been hospitalized and put on dialysis as she urgently searches for a kidney donor.

articles.title: Wasserman Exits Extend Beyond Music as Soccer Star Abby Wambach Departs: “Casey Should Resign” - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "I know what I know, and I am following my gut and my values," Wambach said. "I will not participate in any business arrangement under his leadership."

articles.title: Piers Morgan Says MAGA Going Woke Over Bad Bunny, Slams Megyn Kelly - Variety
articles.description: Piers Morgan says MAGA is acting like the thin-skinned, woke left over Bad Bunny's Super Bowl Halftime Show.
